description:
A multi-platform proxy app. Auto, SSH, VLESS, Vmess, Trojan, Reality, Sing-Box, Clash, Xray, Shadowsocks


Release DownloadsHighlights:
üí• This version includes the Xray Core, allowing you to use both Singbox and Xray cores simultaneously.
- Added Advanced Config Editor
- Added Xray core to the backend:
To use the Xray core, simply add the following to the end of your proxy link:
&core=xray or just change vless, vmess, trojan to xvless, xvmess, xtrojan
- Support for the new generation of Filtering circumvention as Split HTTP:
This feature helps keep your CDN connections alive.
- Added support for both IPv4 and IPv6 versions in the WireGuard protocol.
- Added a configuration editor:
You can now edit configurations within the app using the EDIT option.
- Fix bug with alpn in configs
- Added more modes to Warp:
    - 6 new modes and one advanced mode have been added to Warp, ranging from m1 to m6 and hHEX.
    - Set ifpm in the configuration to one of the modes. For example: ifpm=m4
    - Advanced mode hHEX:
In this mode, any number between 00 and FF can be used. Example: ifpm=h04FA0A
    - Configurations support both IPv4 and IPv6:
        - Setting auto4 in the Warp address will only provide an IPv4 range
        - Setting auto6 will only provide an IPv6 range
        - Setting auto will provide both ranges
    - ‚û°Ô∏è Sample configurations for Warp
